sentences.en: It was found out that certain herbal medicines had curative effect on AIDS.
sentences.cn: 经研究发现有些草药对艾滋病有疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To estimate the curative effect of anastomosed laceration canaliculus.
sentences.cn: 目的评价显微吻合外伤性泪小管断离的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the curative effects of different methods on simple obesity.
sentences.cn: 目的观察采用不同方法治疗单纯性肥胖症的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the clinical curative effect of X - ray stereotactic radiotherapy.
sentences.cn: 目的观察 X 线立体定向放射治疗复发性卵巢癌的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the curative effect of senile caries treated with FX.
sentences.cn: 目的观察FX玻璃 离子水门汀对老年龋病的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the curative effects of Quzha Lotion curing rosacea.
sentences.cn: 目的观察祛渣洗剂治疗酒渣鼻的疗效.

sentences.en: ObjectivePrepare the Douyan mixture and observe its clinical curative effect.
sentences.cn: 目的制备窦炎合剂并观察其临床疗效.

sentences.en: The curative agent system is completely closed and air proof.
sentences.cn: 涂胶机固化剂系统,为全封闭系统,杜绝了空气的混入.

sentences.en: The curative effect far exceeded all expectations.
The scaffold were believed to have curative powers.
sentences.cn: 人们认为绞刑架具有治病的功效.
这处泉水号称能治病的功效

sentences.en: Then judge the curative effect according to the curative standard.
sentences.cn: 根据疗效标准判断疗效.

sentences.en: They exert their curative effects by gumming up the works of key proteins in the body.
sentences.cn: 它们借助与体内关键蛋白质相结合发挥作用,达到治疗效果.

sentences.en: To observe the curative effect of Xuesetong injection to cerebral thrombosis.
sentences.cn: 采用完全随机设计,观察血塞通注射液对脑血栓形成的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Too much is spent on expensive curative medicine and too little on preventive medicine.
sentences.cn: 在昂贵的治疗性药物上花费太多，在预防性药物上的支出则太少。

trans.tran_en: able to or intended to cure illness
